hackathon-description-text: Calling all NYC high school students - do you like playing mobile games and want to make games of your own to show your friends? Do you have an idea that will be the 'next Flabby Birds,' but don't know how to bring it to life?

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Group Head, Innovation Management, MasterCard Labs
Senior Vice President, Engineering, Major League Gaming

hackathon-description-header: With the help of industry mentors, each team of NYC high school students will build a mobile web game that runs on the TreSensa Game Engine.
